scripts.start: npm run prepare-demo && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node start.js
scripts.build-api-docs: rimraf -rf api-docs.tmp && mkdirp api-docs.tmp/source api-docs.tmp/docs && cp -r docs/api-docs api-docs.tmp/source && sed -i s@__env__baseURI__@$SERVER_URL@g api-docs.tmp/source/api-docs/main.raml && raml2html api-docs.tmp/source/api-docs/main.raml > api-docs.tmp/docs/index.html
scripts.validate-api-docs: rimraf -rf api-docs.tmp && mkdirp api-docs.tmp/source api-docs.tmp/docs && cp -r docs/api-docs api-docs.tmp/source && sed -i s@__env__baseURI__@$SERVER_URL@g api-docs.tmp/source/api-docs/main.raml && raml-validate api-docs.tmp/source/api-docs/main.raml
scripts.test-restapi: pm2 start start.js --name 'fmServer' && mocha --require config/test/mocha-setup.js --recursive api-tests/*.spec.js --reporter mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=./config/test/reporters.json && pm2 delete 'fmServer'
